original_definition: 'new service station' means a service station which is built or for which an individual planning permission, construction licence or operating licence is granted on or after 1 January 2012;
generated_definition: 'new service station' means a facility that provides fuel, lubricants, and other services to vehicles, distinct from an existing service station.

Article 2: ‘new service station’ means a service station which is built or for which an individual planning permission, construction licence or operating licence is granted on or after 1 January 2012;
